title: 145 - Mitt Got Scammed By A Fake Landlord
description: On today's show, the boys chat about Mitt getting catfished by a landlord and throwing $1000 down the drain on a new apartment, only to be ghosted after sending the money, plus go through all the different things they're currently watching and what they're excited for in the coming weeks. They also dive into a Pod FOD loaded with different topics including some of Hitler's reported sexual proclivities, a report that suggests men who big noses have bigger penises, what dried out stingray's look like (demons), Bill and Melinda Gates calling it quits on their marriage, the CEO of a $2 billion company getting fired for taking LSD before meetings, Tony and Bill battling for truck supremacy, Tony's new Z-Turn lawn mower, Zeet potentially getting into the riding lawn mower game, and much more. Don't forget to send your submissions into the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to be featured on the show. We appreciate you all for listening, we'll see you on Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
